data.eml:eml: Paraschistura kermanensis, a new stone loach species from southeastern Iran (Teleostei: Nemacheilidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sayyadzadeh, Golnaz, Teimori, Azad, Esmaeili, Hamid Reza (2019): Paraschistura kermanensis, a new stone loach species from southeastern Iran (Teleostei: Nemacheilidae). Zootaxa 4638 (4): 571-583, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4638.4.7
